name: halloween_spooky
description: Spooky Halloween transformations with costumes and creatures
author: StarStitch

global_scene.location_prompt: spooky Halloween night, full moon, misty graveyard background, orange and purple lighting, atmospheric fog, 4k
global_scene.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, low quality, too bright, daylight

sequence.name: Normal Self
sequence.visual_prompt: Person with neutral expression, casual clothes

sequence.name: Vampire
sequence.visual_prompt: Elegant vampire with pale skin, sharp fangs, dark cape, mysterious gaze

sequence.name: Werewolf
sequence.visual_prompt: Werewolf with fur, glowing eyes, pointed ears, fierce expression
